title: KABK
content:
I am going to Den Haag on the 28th. Does anyone know how to get to KABK from the Centraal Station?  
Is TypeMedia in the main building or will I have to travel across town to meet the right people?

 [‹ Got a favor? Need a favor?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222936/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17185 "Go to previous forum topic") [Want to find 1967 underground newspaper from Den Haag, Holland, named IETS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706222936/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17170 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sebsan

comments.content:
Hello Sebastien,  
It’s very close to the Central Station. Just leave the building through the main entrance (taxi side), walk to the road and go left. Over the bridge you have to go right and you see KABK on the left. TypeMedia is in that building, but I don’t know exactly where. I followed the course (2001-2002) but they change rooms about every year.  
Pieter
